byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: Golden Gate Capital, the West Coast private equity firm, has closed its latest fund at $3.5 billion, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: Golden Gate Capital, the West Coast private equity firm, has closed its latest fund at $3.5 billion, according to people briefed on the matter.

headline.main: Golden Gate Capital Closes $3.5 Billion Fund
